definitions.definition: A wide band of material covering the ends of roof rafters , sometimes supporting a gutter in steep - slope roofing, but typically it is a border or trim in low- slope roofing.
A face or front cover of an appliance , especially of a mobile phone .
A flat band or broad fillet ; especially, one of the three bands that make up the architrave , in the Ionic order.
A broad well-defined band of color .
A band, sash , or fillet ; especially, in surgery , a bandage or roller .
A sash worn by certain members of the Catholic and Anglican churches.
The layer of loose tissue , often containing fat , immediately beneath the skin ; the stronger layer of connective tissue covering and investing muscles and organs ; an aponeurosis .
The signboard above a shop or other location open to the public.

main_definition: ( architecture ) A wide band of material covering the ends of roof rafters , sometimes supporting a gutter in steep - slope roofing, but typically it is a border or trim in low- slope roofing.
secondary_definitions: A face or front cover of an appliance , especially of a mobile phone .
( architecture ) A flat band or broad fillet ; especially, one of the three bands that make up the architrave , in the Ionic order.
A broad well-defined band of color .
A band, sash , or fillet ; especially, in surgery , a bandage or roller .
( ecclesiastical , fashion ) A sash worn by certain members of the Catholic and Anglican churches.
( anatomy ) The layer of loose tissue , often containing fat , immediately beneath the skin ; the stronger layer of connective tissue covering and investing muscles and organs ; an aponeurosis .
The signboard above a shop or other location open to the public.
